original_text: The men returned to David's house. They found the idol on the bed and the pillow of goat's hair at its head.
korean_text: 전령들이 들어가 본즉 침상에는 우상이 있고 염소 털로 엮은 것이 그 머리에 있었더라

sentences.original_text: The men returned to David's house
They found the idol on the bed
and the pillow of goat's hair at its head
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 머리맡에 염소 털 베개가 있었습니다
